item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for South Shore Hike, Bike & Snowshoe Club....... & then some!

What: Single Mingle @ McFadden's Pub Providence RI

When: January 30, 2009 7:00 PM

Price: $10.00 per person

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meetup Description: Single Mingle @ McFadden’s Pub Friday Jan 30th 7-12
……………………………..
Our mission is to provide a venue, with more panache than the average joint, where 30-50 something singles can meet and get to know each other in a no-stress, lo-calorie, crash-tested, USDA approved, fun, festive environment. Most Guests are 30-50 but all are welcome.

Food – A full menu with and several bars will keep your palate satisfied.

7:00-9:00 pm ~ Single Mingle Cocktail. This is where the music is softer and you have unique opportunity to mingle with the other guests. TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS MINGLE TIME !

9:00 - just a whole bunch of fun...

Ice Breakers – which is a euphemism for an excuse to talk to someone, will be provided. Speed dating will be available to the first 40 (20 of each sex) who wish to participate. Starts at 7:30. Please arrive at 7:00 to register. More casual ice breakers will be provided for the less adventurous guests. We see it as our job to help you meet new people and make new friends

Invite all those that you have been chatting with but haven’t had the time or courage to meet.

As always - please dress to impress – no Jeans, Sneakers or T-shirts. And remember boys … plenty of mouthwash and Aqua-Velva!

All for a mere $10 – Such a freakun’ Bahguhn !!

Learn more here:
http://socialnetwork....
item.how_to_find_us: We have a private room - ask for the Single Mingle

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Single Mingle @ McFadden's - Providence RI
